description:
Course Description

Reiki Healing Level I is a simple, safe, and effective healing technique that anyone can learn and practice.

This course will teach you how to give Reiki healing to yourself and others.

This course includes 10 video lectures, a Reiki Manual (pdf format) to print off, 2 bonus meditations, quizzes, practical worksheets and once you have been attuned to Reiki and completed this course you will receive a Reiki I Certificate.

These are the amazing benefits of Reiki I:

* Can help you to de-stress and promote relaxation and a clear mind
* Can help in reducing anxiety and depression by lifting your mood and emotions
* Can assist with pain reduction in your body
* Easy to use on children to help them relax and be calm
* Easy to use on your pets to alleviate aliments
* Can use on plants to help them grow and thrive
* Can greatly assist with your spiritual growth and connection to self

During this course, you will learn:

* All about Reiki and it's history
* Grounding and protecting techniques
* About the 7 major chakras - their functions/colours
* Self healing positions
* Reiki healing positions to assist you in healing others
* All about Reiki Attunements

Requirements of this course are:

* A desire to learn all about Reiki
* A commitment to healing yourself
* A massage table if you intend on healing others

The Target Audience of this Course:

* This course is designed for the complete beginner to someone who has knowledge of holistic therapies.

* It is aimed at anyone wanting to better their lives and heal parts of themselves that need healing.
title: Become a Certified Reiki I Practitioner
